data.text: @RiverWardRiley @OttawaHealth Thank you! However, I think they should consider offering it, especially as all the restrictions are being lifted.
@RiverWardRiley @MNeigham @OttawaHealth Alpha variant is long gone. But you do you.
@MNeigham @OttawaHealth I didn't get the memo saying COVID was over.

@49TJH @OttawaHealth I believe a 4th was available to some LTC home residents and those who are immunocompromised.  
It is not offered to the general population.

@Laura_Dudas @RiverWardRiley @OttawaHealth Celebrate? More data coming on adverse impacts. Did any of you city councillors ever ask any questions about @OttawaHealth measures? Didn't you notice we kept doing the same thing over & over again for no benefit but so much harm? Group-think I guess! Dumbing down on display.
@RiverWardRiley @kermit77554093 @OttawaHealth But it was your choice to post the photo of your teens which I personally think is a bad idea but you do you. Noticed you removed your pronouns!

@RiverWardRiley @OttawaHealth The vaccines a highly effective. Everyone must continue taking more doses of highly effective vaccines.
Also, keep wearing a mask.
Also, still test to travel.
Also, still get infected.
Also, still infect others.

Highly effective vaccines.
@RiverWardRiley @OttawaHealth Getting rid of that double chin will do a lot more good than a booster of something that didn't work the first 2 times.
@RiverWardRiley @OttawaHealth The 3rd sacrament. Covidius is pleased. Go thee forward in virtue.
